Timer.name: blackout
Timer.script: if snd.have_aff("blackout") then snd.send("qeb concentrate") snd.send("qeb compose") snd.send("qeb stand") snd.send("qeb eat vial") snd.send("qeb touch tree") cecho("\n<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) else disableTimer("blackout") end

Timer.name: recklessblackouttimer
Timer.script:
if snd.have_aff("blackout") or snd.have_aff("recklessness") and snd.toggles.active then local percentesthealth = snd.percentesthealth*100 / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp local percentestmana = snd.percentestmana*100 / gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp
if tonumber(percentesthealth) > 74 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 75 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 74 and tonumber(snd.percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<green>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<red> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 0 and tonumber(percentestmana) < 50 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<red> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 75 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 50 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 75 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) elseif tonumber(percentesthealth) > 0 and tonumber(percentesthealth) < 50 and tonumber(percentestmana) > 74 then cecho("
<red>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. "<green> Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) else cecho("
<yellow>Health: " ..snd.percentesthealth.. " Mana: " ..snd.percentestmana) end else disableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") end

Timer.name: salveretryretard
Timer.script: if snd.salveretry and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true if #snd.aff_list == 0 then snd.salveaffflag = false snd.salveretry = false end disableTimer("salveretryretard") else snd.salvebal = false disableTimer("salveretryretard") end elseif not snd.salveretry then disableTimer("salveretryretard") end

Timer.name: salveretry
Timer.script: if snd.salveretry and not snd.have_aff("blackout") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true if #snd.aff_list == 0 then snd.salveaffflag = false snd.salveretry = false end disableTimer("salveretryretard") else snd.salvebal = false disableTimer("salveretryretard") end elseif not snd.salveretry then disableTimer("salveretryretard") end

Timer.name: Firstaidstatustimer
Timer.script:
if snd.firstaid then
if snd.toggles.active then snd.firstaidassist() snd.avoidancecheck() snd.unknownafter() if snd.have_aff("nyctophobia") and gmcp.Char.Vitals.herb == "1" then send("firstaid priority nyctophobia 3") end if (snd.defenses.def_caloric.state ~= "deffed" and snd.salvebal and not (snd.have_aff("slickness") or snd.have_aff("sandrot"))) or (snd.have_aff("deaf") or snd.have_aff("blind") or snd.defenses.def_waterbreathing.state ~= "deffed") and snd.herbalance and not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and snd.statustimer and not snd.have_aff("hypothermia") then snd.statustimer = false if statustimer_timer then killTimer(statustimer_timer) end statustimer_timer = tempTimer(300.0,[[snd.statustimer = true]]) snd.firstaiddefenceset() elseif gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" and not snd.have_aff("anorexia") and not snd.have_aff("destroyed_throat") and (snd.defenses.def_venom.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_speed.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_frost.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_caloric.state ~= "deffed" or snd.defenses.def_levitation.state ~= "deffed") and snd.statustimer then snd.statustimer = false if statustimer_timer then killTimer(statustimer_timer) end statustimer_timer = tempTimer(300.0,[[snd.statustimer = true]]) snd.firstaiddefenceset() elseif snd.defenses.def_fangbarrier.state ~= "deffed" and snd.salvebal and not snd.have_aff("slickness") and not snd.have_aff("sandrot") and snd.statustimer then snd.statustimer = false if statustimer_timer then killTimer(statustimer_timer) end statustimer_timer = tempTimer(300.0,[[snd.statustimer = true]]) snd.firstaiddefenceset()
end end end
